name: restful-api
description: | HTTP Method | Endpoint | CRUD Operation | Route Name | Description| |--|--|--|--|--| | Get | /recipes | Read | index | Display list of recipes | | Get | /recipes/new | None | New | Show form to fill out new recipe card | | POST | /recipes | Create | create | Add a new recipe to recipe book | | Get | /recipes/:recipesID | Read | show | Display a specific recipe | | Get | /recipes/:recipeID/edit | Read | edit | Show a form to edit existing recipe | | Put | /recipes/recipeID | Update | update | Update a specific recipe | | DELETE | /recipes/:recipeID | Delete | delete | Remove a specific recipe from the list |
